featured.text: One of the first European books to be printed in movable type was Johannes Gutenberg's 42-line Bible.

definition.zh_def: 約翰尼斯，一個常見的男性名字，源於希伯來語，意為「上帝是仁慈的」。
definition.en_def: Johannes is a common male given name of Hebrew origin meaning 'God is gracious.'
definition.example: Johannes is planning to travel to Europe next summer.
